GAMEPLAY_HikingPackADesc.English: A large bag designed for professional hikers. Can be worn in addition to your current backpack.
GAMEPLAY_HikingPackADesc.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa grande diseñada para excursionistas profesionales. Se puede usar además de su mochila actual.
GAMEPLAY_HikingPackADesc.French (France): Un grand sac conçu pour les randonneurs professionnels. Peut être porté en complément de votre sac à dos actuel.

GAMEPLAY_EmergencyAxeDesc.English: A reliable tool that can cut or open virtually anything.
GAMEPLAY_EmergencyAxeDesc.Spanish (Spain): Una herramienta confiable que puede cortar o abrir prácticamente cualquier cosa.
GAMEPLAY_EmergencyAxeDesc.French (France): Un outil fiable qui peut couper ou ouvrir pratiquement n'importe quoi.

GAMEPLAY_HarnessADesc.English: Makes the journey easier for a weary traveler.
GAMEPLAY_HarnessADesc.Spanish (Spain): Hace el viaje más fácil para un viajero cansado.
GAMEPLAY_HarnessADesc.French (France): Facilite le voyage pour un voyageur fatigué.
